column3:
“I had obtained Grapefruit from my provider due to them not having my usual strains in stock a few months back. Their lineup is all outstanding, so I was more than content trying something new.
Upon getting home and opening the bag, I was overwhelmed with a strong, bitter citrus aroma that was obviously the cause for it's name. Mouthwatering and almost beckons you to bring your nose closer again for multiple whiffs.
V...”

“This aromatic sativa has a citrusy taste and scent with a nice full yet energetic high.  Light colas with more orange hairs than a Irish orphanage.  Great for daytime hiking, biking, surfing, gardening, housecleaning, and goes good with morning coffee even as part of a daily nutritional breakfast.”

“Grapefruit is a phenomenal strain for my PTSD. As a Marine veteran I hardly used cannabis pre enlistment, but after treating my ptsd related anxiety for years with alcohol I was desperate to find a change. The multiple meds the VA gave me took me on one of the worst emotional roller coaster rides of my life then I found the grapefruit strain. This strain proved stereotypes wrong. I could function without  couch lock ...”

“In one word, Grapefruit could be described as HEADY. 
This wonderfully citrus-sweet Sativa has an palate that is very unique to the strain; I could easily pick it out in a blind taste-test. It leaves behind the taste of a sharp citrus fruit with hints of a sweet almost candy-like flavor. The yield was better than I had expected, with nice light green colas that were large in size, and nice and dense too. I recommend ...”

“I absolutely love this strain. I suffer from debilatating anxiety. I have been staying away from sativas, scared for any extra energy. We had a vendor bring in a sample and I tried it before I did any research on the strain. I FELT AMAZING!! I wanted to dance!! I give this bud a 9 across the board, Taste, smell, effects....AWESOME!! I was shocked when I found out it was a pure Sativa...One of my new favorite strains....”

“A sweet hitting, citrusy and uplifting strain that gets you talking and induces a sociable, happy and giggly high. Won't put you to sleep, but helps a lot with pain or soreness. Can begin to make lighter smokers paranoid if you overdo it. A good wake and Bake smoke.”

“Pleasant strain that didn't totally strip me of my mental faculties. Sedating, but didn't make me lethargic. Felt a general sense of well-being. Suppressed my nausea and made me a little hungry (so the tug to eat is there, but not overwhelming). Overall, pretty decent.”

“Heady! Very uplifting and energetic. Might be a little strong for people who do not smoke daily. Great work strain for the grind if you can handle it. Smells just like a yellow grapefruit,  amazingly similar.  Taste kinda sour but also sweet at the same time. Very tasty. I'm literally going back for more as soon as I'm done with this review!!!”

“This is a great strain.  it has a high sativa % and is loaded with crystals and smells just like a grapefruit. its one of my fav daytimes and you still can smoke small amounts in the evening and still have a somewhat chilled buzzz.”

“Oooh, exceptional come on. It’s all smooth and rich with a genuinely happy mood elevation that so floods you with positivity, you can’t help but smile. Things have an “off” cinematic quality...like you’re placed on set of good movie. The dominant mental vibe is a bursting euphoria that’s now seamlessly meshing with physical bursts of tingles all over the body. Almost equally strong feelings of having “fun”! Which mak...”

“This is a sativa strain that will make both the connoisseur, and new-comers a good experience.

You can definitely smell why they called it grapefruit; thankfully I love it. 

Only a few hits (based on tolerance) I could start feeling the effects. It was a very active and pleasant experience .  

In my opinion one of the best qualities for those whom feel uncomfortable talking to other people, or heck, even strangers...”

“Just smoked a huge rip of this for the first time a few minutes ago, and that was after smoking alot of other bud so take this review for what it is i guess.  First off the sample I received was of fairly high quality, taste and smell i s very pleasant like a typical sexy foreign sativa.  Effects were surprisingly calm and very spacey in the head, which i personally love.  Great for doing almost anything if you have ...”

“This is a solid sativa that hits hard quick. It is a cerebral experience to say the least. If you are a fan of listening to music, sit down with some Grapefruit and a good playlist and your next hour or so should be a great one. Too much of a good thing can be bad though, I've found that one too many tokes of this can leave you feeling lazy and tired with classic red-eye and a daze sort of feeling on the way down.”

“beautiful buds that almost look the color of grapefruit peel. this is probably one of my favorite tasting strains(smelling too) and it hits you good and hard, after half a fatty I was soaring! and this strain give me the munchies in the best way possible and then gives me an energy boost so I'm not bound to the couch...even though that's where I stayed”

“The batch I received was the perfect texture for rolling jays, dense with no seeds. The buds where long and somewhat thick with a non-uniformed hybridy sort of structure. Smells just like grapefruit and when smoked from a Jay   the consumer tastes the fruity citrus profile. 
 I experienced little to no paranoia on this strain. I have anxiety induced ADHD so usually a sativa makes me to thinky and paranoid. I had a ve...”
“Grapefruit, very potent. Really smooth as the high builds. Perfect for a nice big rasta j.”

“Fruity smelling nice buds. Enjoyable, clear, relaxed. Nice for chilling with friends on a summer evening kinda smoke.
I'd consider it a good everyday medication, mellow and subtle high. I'd rate it 8/10.”

“This is my favorite sativa strain.  The smell of this strain is amazing. It's the fruitiest smelling flower i have ever come across. This strain will give you a clear headed high and it will also makes you feel really relaxed. The effects start in forehead and work their way down to your feet. The high will last over 2 hours.”
“my gosh do i love everything about this strain.  completely relaxes me, euphoric,  a lifes good feeling.  plus it does have great pain relieving properties too amazing taste and smell.”
“My fuck does this strain taste and smell amazing! Gonna not yell at my neighbor tonight for sure”

“Great strain. The smell is heavenly, and the taste was unbelievable. Honestly, I would smoke it even if it didn't get me high. As for the effect, I smoked a  bowl while getting ready for a bike ride, and ended up powerbiking 7 miles without stopping. So energy is awesome. 
One of my all time favorites.”

“Truely the best sativa available. This  strains flavor and smoothness is incredible. Like taking a bite of grapefruit covered with sugar. It's effects cause an immediate  blasting rush of euphoria with a tingling body sensation. Once she settles in enjoy your clear headed Lazer precision focus and feeling of everything will be OK. Great for people who have to get things accomplished.”
“Nice all day strain......You don't get too sleepy.......good for pain control and for putting on an appetite. Easy to stay focused and on top of things but still has a nice punch to it..”

“Here is my overall review on this strain:

(I tried this strain both at home and outside in the forest)


Inside:  Felt a little anxious; tried watching a movie or tried doing misc errands in the house and got a little anxious with my thoughts.  My mind started to race a bit, but not too much where it was overwhelming -- It was just a bit uncomfortable.  I did notice that the uplifting" effects from the strain start...”"
“A 1st class strain: wonderful scent, juicy flavor, the only con is that it makes your mouth a bit dry. But the high is simply perfect!”

“Great strain. The smell is heavenly, and the taste was unbelievable. Honestly, I would smoke it even if it didn't get me high. As for the effect, I smoked a  bowl while getting ready for a bike ride, and ended up powerbiking 7 miles without stopping. So energy is awesome. 
One of my all time favorites.”
“my gosh do i love everything about this strain.  completely relaxes me, euphoric,  a lifes good feeling.  plus it does have great pain relieving properties too amazing taste and smell.”

“Love grapefruit ganja! Love the effects on my anxiety & depression. Helps me stay happy & focused. Reminds me of C99 which is one of my fav's. 
While the buzz lasts you have lots of energy, but to keep it going, just burn some more. If you stop smokin, you may fall asleep.”

“The Grapefruit buds i got from Chronic Kush were great quality. around the 22-24% THC mark makes this a potent smoke ideal for daytime. The looks of the buds were dark emerald green with sparse rusty hairs with a thick coat of clear trichromes that make it sparkle. Thick firm buds. The buzz was busy and cerebral without being racy which kept me functional and focused on busy days. Grapefruit is a great strain for str...”

“Does bring the good joyful mood which uplift the mind in the happy way to see the life. This is always captivating to let the effect of the Grapefruit does to you exactly what the flower wants. By the way the taste involves you in the citrus way of feeling well the way you like to keep you uplift and by looking for peace by wisdom. This is a sativa but you feel almost to be under highness of a strong sedative indica....”

“This is a very clean sativa, but there's some clear remnants of an indica stone from its mixed lineage, with a contrasting energy that is initially energetic, and then relaxing. Smells and tastes incredible - I love the aroma of grapefruit. It's almost like the cultivators had me in mind.

This is my current favorite strain at the time of writing for introspection, meditation, creativity, and basically anything that ...”

“Picked this up at the Clinic on Colfax. Pungent citrus aroma, definitely not unlike grapefruit peels. Smoke has that hazy citrus quality as well. I am not usually a huge sativa person but I am a fan of the flavor and effects on this one. Not too racy, a nice uplifting daytime smoke.”

“I got a nice 92% mix with ACDC from green centaur in Fairfield can. the body high is amazing and my head is buzzing. I'm totally relaxed without couch lock. I'm bipolar with awful anxiety, PTSD, and panic disorder, this allows me to function.”

“I am delighted with the Grapefruit I've gotten from both 172nd st Cannabis in Arlington, as well as The Vault in Lake Stevens, recently.
For me this is a happy, zippy, energetic, loosen muscles, wake & bake without teeth clenching, edgy jitters or HIGH anxiety. 
One of the few I've found that lets me function, be active, stay awake, even socialize & still get measurable relief from muscle spasms & nerve pain. I don't...”

“Does bring the good joyful mood which uplift the mind in the happy way to see the life. This is always captivating to let the effect of the Grapefruit does to you exactly what the flower wants. By the way the taste involves you in the citrus way of feeling well the way you like to keep you uplift and by looking for peace by wisdom. This is a sativa but you feel almost to be under highness of a strong sedative indica....”

“The Grapefruit buds i got from Chronic Kush were great quality. around the 22-24% THC mark makes this a potent smoke ideal for daytime. The looks of the buds were dark emerald green with sparse rusty hairs with a thick coat of clear trichromes that make it sparkle. Thick firm buds. The buzz was busy and cerebral without being racy which kept me functional and focused on busy days. Grapefruit is a great strain for str...”
“this shit makes you be in a diferent floor.”
“i love this strain. so much like pink grapefruit. what a nice uplifting pain free day thanks to this strain.”

“Well where do I start with this one? medicinally this will KILL your depression in a heartbeat turn your lethargic butt into that drunk girl at the bar yelling wooooo-hoo! Jokes aside, this strain is the most uplifting I've had, euphoria and a hint of creativity, the creativity may invite you outdoors or add the one extra plan to your day!
If you get actual grapefruit, the smell is so good, that citrus smell combined...”

“A very good strain that will get you out of the sad clouds for sure. Was put into a uplifted happy mood while feeling energized without any anxiousness that some users get with Sativas. Might have been the small amount of CBD in the strain keeping me from experiencing any anxiety. Felt very functional, headache free, and got me singing along to my music. 
Medical use from Grapefruit I highly recommend this for mood d...”

“This is now by far currently my favorite strain! It helps so, SO, much with the muscle spasms in my back in my trapezius muscles as part of my Fibromyalgia and Complex Regional Pain Syndrome - also great for depression, too! Anxiety? Not the best, but it's not bad. It's definitely not one of those strains that causes paranoia, anxiety or panic though. It is a bit hallucinogenic and I really would discourage trying to...”

“Citrus and Desiel flavor profiles combine to nail a grapefruit flavor & scent! Couple that with it's stereotypical sativa effects of an uplifting & creative nature. This makes for a great daytime smoke, but it's sativa effects can accentuate anxiety.”
“Very good uplifting high. Great for staying up late and working on something important.”

“I absolutely love this strain. it's my second favorite right next to LSD. This weed is very happy, very euphoric so for those of you with depression or just want to have a good time... I totally recommend this strain!”

“• Yum! • This 💣T-92.43% sweet sativa Grapefruit oil is easy on the 👁 👁.. and nose and lungs and mind and body¡! It’s a tasty daytime treat, as she brings with her an energizing body + mind-buzz— but not speedily— & does not produce anxiety..💥 Enhances creativity, productivity, outlook & mindset, so I highly recommend to all! •👌🏻✌🏽•”

“A very good strain that will get you out of the sad clouds for sure. Was put into a uplifted happy mood while feeling energized without any anxiousness that some users get with Sativas. Might have been the small amount of CBD in the strain keeping me from experiencing any anxiety. Felt very functional, headache free, and got me singing along to my music. 
Medical use from Grapefruit I highly recommend this for mood d...”
“favorite strain, period.  great for up time.  no paranoia.  heady, happy, energetic.  great for dancing”

“Not much vapor. A slight effect is first noticed before feeling stoned like other, more potent strains. Produces a tingly feeling in my head, like champagne bubbles in a glass of wine. Then, the effects wash over like a warm, Jamaican beach wave, the undertow pulling me deeper into relaxation and euphoria. Activates the mind, too.
Good for pain relief and eye pressure.
This is one hell of a strain. I feel like I'm st...”

“A very good strain that will get you out of the sad clouds for sure. Was put into a uplifted happy mood while feeling energized without any anxiousness that some users get with Sativas. Might have been the small amount of CBD in the strain keeping me from experiencing any anxiety. Felt very functional, headache free, and got me singing along to my music. 
Medical use from Grapefruit I highly recommend this for mood d...”
“favorite strain, period.  great for up time.  no paranoia.  heady, happy, energetic.  great for dancing”

“Not much vapor. A slight effect is first noticed before feeling stoned like other, more potent strains. Produces a tingly feeling in my head, like champagne bubbles in a glass of wine. Then, the effects wash over like a warm, Jamaican beach wave, the undertow pulling me deeper into relaxation and euphoria. Activates the mind, too.
Good for pain relief and eye pressure.
This is one hell of a strain. I feel like I'm st...”
“This strain was a perfect sidekick for a night of ps4 and to wash away stress and anxiety from work! Uplifting, social, fairly clear!”
“Keeps me active and hungry.....i only weight 92 pounds at 47 with major debilitated health problems....works great.”

“I absolutely love this strain. it's my second favorite right next to LSD. This weed is very happy, very euphoric so for those of you with depression or just want to have a good time... I totally recommend this strain!”
“Had a Q of this stuff, when I opened the bag, I literally smelt like a carton of grapefruit juice. Very quick acting body high, fat fluffy buds. Definitely pay top shelf for these flavours👌🏼.”
“Nice floral scent and not only took away my pain but,let me with a calm feeling.”
“AMAZING. Really uplifting. And put me in a flirty mood :)”
“I enjoyed this pleasant buzz after a long car ride. It did the trick perfectly, simultaneously it brought my mood up and helped my body relax.”

“I normally use sativa hybrids to medicate,
Grapefruit is by far one of my favorites.
Got a good grow, the high has that cinderella glow.
Do not underestimate!  this stuff is fire!”
“Smells and tastes exactly like Grapefruit! Super stoney, heavy high. We ALWAYS have this strain!”

“Picked up this strain in Dry Leaf from Solevo Wellness here in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania today. Grown by Terrapin Care Station in Jersey Shore, PA in July of 2018; this package was a little dry as it is now September. Still aesthetically pleasing, opening the container one finds large budded, kiefy" almost silvered resin glazed nuggets that have hues of light green colored tri-combs covered in a dust among a forest o...”"

“Very pungent smell, opened the bag and my roommate could smell it from upstairs! Not so potent though but definitely takes the edge off. I'd recommend it to anyone looking to wake and bake that's for sure”
“All time favorite since trying it last week.  Keep going back for more.  Leaves you happy, relaxed, satisfied and can get some serious housework done while having fun doing it. Haha.”

“Great fruity taste, stays really citrus while remenbering the smell of the woods. Couchlock effect, when you want to take again the joint you feel so lazy that you are just able to think but not move. It helped me with the migranes. Just wanna sleep 🔥✌”

“This is my favourite wake n bake herb. I'm not a morning person at all but after a couple tokes of grapefruit, I'm energised, with a smile on my face, and ready for the day. the high is uplifting, clear headed, energetic and makes me kind of chatty.  on the  downside I've noticed that it does temporarily make me a bit clumsy and all thumbs. however, it's a slight inconvenience for an otherwise amazing strain. pair th...”
“when you first inhale the sour citrusy taste fills your mouth. exhaling shifts like a sour patch and taste sort of sweet creme !! i love this weed because it’s a very good sativa:!)”
“Smells and tastes exactly like Grapefruit! Super stoney, heavy high. We ALWAYS have this strain!”

“It's a decent strain but nothing too exceptional. It reminds me a lot of what I used to smoke in the 90s. It does have a good flavor though. It does not make you tired but does little for creativity. I feel more dumb stoned than anything.”
“I enjoyed this pleasant buzz after a long car ride. It did the trick perfectly, simultaneously it brought my mood up and helped my body relax.”

“Very pungent smell, opened the bag and my roommate could smell it from upstairs! Not so potent though but definitely takes the edge off. I'd recommend it to anyone looking to wake and bake that's for sure”

“I normally use sativa hybrids to medicate,
Grapefruit is by far one of my favorites.
Got a good grow, the high has that cinderella glow.
Do not underestimate!  this stuff is fire!”

“Another one of my all-time favorites. We have a lot of strains named after various fruits of course, but in my eyes Grapefruit, when grown and finished right, has the closest approximation of the fruit it was named for - both in smell and taste. Just one caveat: There's a lot of Grapefruit out there that does not meet the aforementioned criteria, and if you end up with average Grapefruit, you have nothing more than a...”

“Hits you hard with flavor and high, smooth sailing and man I wish I had a boat, or small island lol.. Looks a lot lot Twisted Citrus and I'll bet money the unknown lineage" in that strain has Grapefruit in there somewhere. The first time smoking I did get a little paranoia for about 5mins
column4: but that always happens when I try strong sativas for the first time.. From there on ahead nothing but good times. Really wish i...”"

column3: “Amazing cerebral buzz - daytime strain obviously...hits harder than you think and keeps you happy as hell”
“I enjoyed this pleasant buzz after a long car ride. It did the trick perfectly, simultaneously it brought my mood up and helped my body relax.”

“Very pungent smell, opened the bag and my roommate could smell it from upstairs! Not so potent though but definitely takes the edge off. I'd recommend it to anyone looking to wake and bake that's for sure”

Grapefruit is by far one of my favorites.
Got a good grow, the high has that cinderella glow.
Do not underestimate!  this stuff is fire!”

“This is my favourite wake n bake herb. I'm not a morning person at all but after a couple tokes of grapefruit, I'm energised, with a smile on my face, and ready for the day. the high is uplifting, clear headed, energetic and makes me kind of chatty.  on the  downside I've noticed that it does temporarily make me a bit clumsy and all thumbs. however, it's a slight inconvenience for an otherwise amazing strain. pair th...”
“this was a go to strain for me with tinctures. mix great with the acidity of a cup of coffee. a nice morning pick-me-up.”

“Really heavy head high, great for a day out.
It did gave me a slight headache, but it worked for my anxiety being a sativa, would really recommend it.”
“All time favorite since trying it last week.  Keep going back for more.  Leaves you happy, relaxed, satisfied and can get some serious housework done while having fun doing it. Haha.”

“Really heavy head high, great for a day out.
It did gave me a slight headache, but it worked for my anxiety being a sativa, would really recommend it.”
“Trail Blazin' Productions has a super-dank Grapefruit that wakes me up when I need it.  It's tasty, looks & smells good, and is affordable.”
“great sativa in the beginning but to me in the end it was an indica cause man I felt lazy lol”
“Absolutely fabulous strain. Smells incredible and the feeling is just a perfect high. Maybe it's the fruity sensation or not but it made me crave a fruit salad.. hah”
“Nice high without anxiety or paranoia.  Better than juicy fruit.”

“I used to smoke a lot of the grapefruit. It is a good strain, grown correctly and with the right Pheno, this is an amazing smoke. The phenotype I like the most has a distinct taste of peanut butter on the exhale, you find that bud and you will be happy!”
“Very pleasant citrus flavor, works get with any smoking method. Upbeat high, not too strong, sometimes hard to find.”

“I normally use sativa hybrids to medicate,
Grapefruit is by far one of my favorites.
Got a good grow, the high has that cinderella glow.
Do not underestimate!  this stuff is fire!”
“This is some top shelf sativa for sure, I was happy and really focused on things! Can't wait to try some more!”

“Hits you hard with flavor and high, smooth sailing and man I wish I had a boat, or small island lol.. Looks a lot lot Twisted Citrus and I'll bet money the unknown lineage" in that strain has Grapefruit in there somewhere. The first time smoking I did get a little paranoia for about 5mins
column4: but that always happens when I try strong sativas for the first time.. From there on ahead nothing but good times. Really wish i...”"

column3: “Dealt with some depression when I wasn't smoking it.”
“smoked after blue cheese, which meant whole body was goood”
“smells just like grapefruit. Smoked smooth and was thc potent”

“Been very busy! Thx for hanging in there :) 

As a Sativa lover and a veteran user, I like the “clean” high of this particular strain. It takes the edge off any pain I have and it doesn’t burn me out right away, instead giving me the classic Sativa lift! I get physical and mental effects and for me that equals a decent strain for a nice uplifting session. This one would be great in a muffin or cookie and useful for d...”

“The batch of Grapefruit that I tried had a very citrusy taste to it, the high was a nice and relaxing body high I felt as though I could still function properly and it didnt slow me down to much, it had a lovely fruity smell, the nuggets seemed to grind very well (like dust) and the buds were very light and covered in bright orange hairs! overall I would rate it a 4 out of 5”
“great sativa in the beginning but to me in the end it was an indica cause man I felt lazy lol”

“Really heavy head high, great for a day out.
It did gave me a slight headache, but it worked for my anxiety being a sativa, would really recommend it.”
“All time favorite since trying it last week.  Keep going back for more.  Leaves you happy, relaxed, satisfied and can get some serious housework done while having fun doing it. Haha.”

“Absolutely fabulous strain. Smells incredible and the feeling is just a perfect high. Maybe it's the fruity sensation or not but it made me crave a fruit salad.. hah”

“What an amazing strain! what can I say this is one of my all time favorite Sativas to smoke. Great smelling citrus buds with a dense smoke.”

“Super uplifting and kind of trippy. Made everything fun. A+.”
“I have post concussion syndrome as well as severe depression, this strain really boosts my mood when I need it. Highly recommend it.”

“So last night me and my friends bought this strain as a dab cart and it was great like 5 hits later I was pretty up there it’s was great we continued to hit and everything was just so great and good and it didn’t make me paranoid or anything like other strains I smoked only downside is that I woke up more slumped than other strains have made me feel but overall would recommend”

“So last night me and my friends bought this strain as a dab cart and it was great like 5 hits later I was pretty up there it’s was great we continued to hit and everything was just so great and good and it didn’t make me paranoid or anything like other strains I smoked only downside is that I woke up more slumped than other strains have made me feel but overall would recommend”

“This is by far the best strain I've smoked while having one of my major migraines and i am also sick and it helped instantly with my nausea and migraine. It's a bit harsh on the throat other than that it tastes amazing, the grapefruit is very present with this bud.”
“Trail Blazin' Productions has a super-dank Grapefruit that wakes me up when I need it.  It's tasty, looks & smells good, and is affordable.”
“AMAZING. Really uplifting. And put me in a flirty mood :)”

“Really heavy head high, great for a day out.
It did gave me a slight headache, but it worked for my anxiety being a sativa, would really recommend it.”
“Very pleasant citrus flavor, works get with any smoking method. Upbeat high, not too strong, sometimes hard to find.”
“All time favorite since trying it last week.  Keep going back for more.  Leaves you happy, relaxed, satisfied and can get some serious housework done while having fun doing it. Haha.”

Grapefruit is by far one of my favorites.
Got a good grow, the high has that cinderella glow.
Do not underestimate!  this stuff is fire!”

“This strain is really good for overall pain in the joints & muscles. Also good for AS symptoms like stiffness, muscle cramps, chronic back pain, nausea, headache, stress, & helps with appetite. High THC content! and helps with much more!”

“This is by far the best strain I've smoked while having one of my major migraines and i am also sick and it helped instantly with my nausea and migraine. It's a bit harsh on the throat other than that it tastes amazing, the grapefruit is very present with this bud.”
“I have post concussion syndrome as well as severe depression, this strain really boosts my mood when I need it. Highly recommend it.”
“this strain is the great for sterss for real. i smoked this grapefruit today first time and i love it <3”

“My friend and I had the pleasure of trying sub x's grapefruit. Love this strain's strong citrus scent. The flower was coated in a significant amount of beautiful thc crystals, especially for a sativa, and long orange hairs. The large buds looked fluffy but were also very dense. First, we rolled a joint and smoked it out on my deck as we gazed out at the moonlit Seattle skyline. It was a very lovely joint, and it got ...”

“Buena sativa.
Cogollos un poco largos, duros y gordos. Verde intensos, pero con muchos hilitos marrones.

Fumar es agradable, se nota claramente la parte citrica con el final dulce. A veces me parece pillar el pomelo, aunque es mas de olor que de sabor.

Me hace sentir energetico, tranquilo, y enfocado. Seguramente optima por el dia o para escuchar musica y pasar una tarde entrenida.”
“I did have a panic attack but I don't know if that was this bud or whatever. super Shit though. like actually.”
“I got this as a free gram when I ordered a while ago. Amazing smell and taste. The smell is absolutely amazing and overpowering. One of my favourite strains.”
“sweet taste,good for the day”

“love this strain! probably my favorite next to Blue Dream. I had a terrible headache before I smoked, and after two hits of grapefruit, I was relaxed/ energized. I felt really really really fucking good.”
“Such a fantastic high!  Made me feel happy but not too giggly. Also seemed to really alleviate muscle pain.”

“Got a bag of this, and first off before even opening the bag I could tell that this was going to be a good smoke Just by the nice dense, dry, forest green Trichome covered nugs that I could see through the bag. After opening it, I fully knew I made a good decision, the smell was delicious, pungy with a bit of earth and a nice citrus kind of finish. The taste was good, not too bland or harsh, didn't make me feel like ...”
“Really nice just feels abit harsh on the throat”

“Migraine pain 6; nausea 6 when I medicated round 1900 or so. Takes bout 10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia. Head high heavy/sleepy; weird for a Sativa dominant (may have had too much or been that tired). Body high exactly what I needed. I was fast asleep by 2030 or so. Can't make up my mind whether this' good for daytime or nighttime use. Highly recommend for pain/nausea.”
“Burned though this cartridge fast and would defiantly buy some more.  Strong strain with good vibes.”
“WasThis strain has a awesome flavor if you're looking for something sweet and fruity and total mind high but feeling awake! love it!”
“Bad short term memory but very nice energetic high ! Not the best I've ever had but good weed.”

“overwhelming sweet aroma, almost difficult to smell. rolled a joint and 15 minutes later i was riding a skateboard around my neighborhood and having my friend throw snowballs at me so i could hit them with a stick. i've never shown more interested in playing sports. incredible sativa.🍊🍋”

“Very tasty and she deserves the name given! The grapefruit smell is intense and pleasant. The smoke is smooth with a very nice sweet exhale. The effect of this lady is a very nice calm happy state with a very sativa buzz. Quite good for daytime medicine. It gave me a tingly sensation in my neck area witch is good because I carry a lot of stress in my neck!! Nice stress and pain relief.”

“l like this strain a lot.  It keeps me focused and it is a great pre workout for the gym. Great if your trying to get something done.  Good after taste as well, just like grapefruit.  Be mindful  tho because if your used to having a heavy euphoric effect from indicas you wont really get that with this nug because it doesn't really get you all loopy but just try to do something you'll see you will be active”
“I was a bit sceptical at first since I tried iced grapefruit that was very poor. This however is amazing! It’s so delicious and fruity. Nice sativa, good for wake and bake!”

“I've tried this in a kurvana cartridge and it's pretty much the perfect hybrid. Not speedy but not too spacey or sleep inducing either. Clear headed and happy high. My go-to day time cartridge & favorite overall (along with True OG) of the kurvana flavors.”

“I've tried this in a kurvana cartridge and it's pretty much the perfect hybrid. Not speedy but not too spacey or sleep inducing either. Clear headed and happy high. My go-to day time cartridge & favorite overall (along with True OG) of the kurvana flavors.”

“This is the first strain I ever purchased myself, and it was worth every penny. Aromatic citrus fills your nose instantly. The taste is just as good as the aroma. A euphoric head high; perfect for daytime. Grapefruit gives a phenomenal creative buzz for hours. My first love will always be my favorite strain.”
“Beautiful citrus aromas and a clean and delightful high”

“A very strong, fast acting, stress reducing, fruity strain thats perfect for wake and bake.  This is a great strain for studying, art projects, social settings or for post-stressful situations.  Delicious and dependable for a busy day at school or work.”
“Bought this one made me felt uplifted and the smell was fruty but strong so goood loved it!”

“This is a pretty potent strain with typical sativa effects. Two rips and I was good for a couple hours. This is a great day strain. It keeps your head clear and brings tons of energy. I smoked in the evening and had difficulty getting to sleep that night.”

“Light-hearted feeling. Balanced effects, not racy. Relaxing and uplifting. Neutral on energy: doesn't cause fatigue but doesn't help it either. Nice taste. I definitely enjoyed it... but it also didn't really stand out too much compared to many other sativa-ish strains, so in a recreational state probably won't repeat purchase.”
“Nice diesely grapefruit flavor and smell. Fairly mild to moderate effects. Nice strain!”
“It's a great, mellow head high”

“Was fortunate enough to get some CO2 Sauce of this strain, and man is it strong. The sweet and sour notes on this strain really make it really live up to the name grapefruit. Not only that, but the high is an excellent classic sativa high. You know you’re in for it as soon as you exhale this shit. Powerfully uplifting while remaining focused this strain is a must try.”
“One of my favourite strains.”
“Dankity Dank! Super tasty! Clean! Like candy and had be dabed out for hours.”
“Had a great time smoking on this, definitely kept me alert and active and also very happy and energetic. 10/10 would recommend this strain”
“Amazing strain.”
“A great sativa, very prolonged effects (in my humble opinion of an average user it is the most long-acting sativa), and very uplifting as well indeed. Soft post-effects afterwards.”

“not to bad had better tbh but has a lovely grapefruit haze taste bit of a creeper , only just had a couple of bong hits but the buzz is quite mellow but nice, I would deffo think that this strain will make want to sit on YouTube for a while lol...3/10”

“not to bad had better tbh but has a lovely grapefruit haze taste bit of a creeper , only just had a couple of bong hits but the buzz is quite mellow but nice, I would deffo think that this strain will make want to sit on YouTube for a while lol...3/10”

“For a heavy sativa I was pleasantly surprised by Grapefruits effects. No to head heavy but very noticeable, the bud itself is very beautiful. Had to try it out never seen or heard about the strain before. Four thumbs up for sure.”
“My friend and I renamed it the screamin' demon."  Let's see if that one catches on.”"
“My favorite wake and bake weed.  I love that I can smoke it all day and still be focused.  Great for painting and yard work!”
“FAntastic for hustling and dealing with IDIOTS!!!! The idiots won't go away, but how you deal with them will be tolerable... LOL. White Collar BS people.”
“very chilled and giggly”
“Smells great! It has so many trichomes that it stays lit”
“Great strain”
“Great strain”

“I love this bud. It smells and taste amazing , and looks like some quality top shelf. Has nice golden kief , and a light green. Seriously uplifting, great for wake and bake , great high. Stress reliever for sure. This is a social or solo bud. Nice smoke build up , hits hard from the bong. This is my second batch and I love it so much im going to buy another 1/4.”
“nice tasting and stoney”

“Strain was grown by Royal Tree Farms, gotta say the smell of grapefruit was incredibly present, and I by no means am no sniff expert, when I smell blueberry I don't smell blueberries, maybe my palate isn't as sensitive as some, but this smell and taste was grapefruit all the way! With a fast acting sativa hitting you like a bullet train makes this strain a great wake and bake bud or just a day of yardwork.”
“Great strain for creativity, uplifting my spirit, and inspiring romance. One of my favorite strains”
“Smells just like Grapefruit, tastes nice and the high is incredible.”

“my friend really likes this strain but  it doesn't do much for me - but if I smoke more than I normally would it gives me a pretty good buzz - good for chatting with friends, prob not as great if you're just hanging by yourself looking to relax.”
“Very smooth on the lungs during inhalation while leaving a distinct grapefruit flavor. Very uplifting and energetic high.”
“Awesome strain, intense grapefruit smell with a strong grapefruit flavor.  Gives an energetic but relaxed high, euphoric, and calming. Just a good all around smoke.”

“Probably one of my favorite mood-elevating strains. Yummy flavor that leaves you generally very happy and a feeling of well being. too much makes you a giggle ball. A+ For Bipolar and Fibro. Ladies, this is a great time of the month strain.”

“Right when I smelt this strain I knew I was going to like it. Smooth, fruity, instant. This strain hits hard but doesn't significantly impair any of my cognitive faculties. I find myself laughing and calm while under this strains influence.”

“Grapefruit in a cartridge K.I.N.D. vape pen is unbelievable.So much flavor just pop's on your pallet with rich juicy grapefruit taste and after taste.Combined with Hashishans in AZ 1:1 5mg BiD on deck was sitting very well going to Wally world not a worry in the world.Medicine from 1:1 tincture helps give grape fruit dose more leg's more cerebral can't get to high or too low.Grapefruit in flower just does not cut it ...”

“Love this strain. Very sticky. Very fruity.

“Now this? This is my favorite BY FAR! It's a great head high that doesn't cause the cloudyness!! I can't even think of a better strain that keeps me focused, alert, and motivated!”

“Bright, Fresh, clean bursting smell immediately hits you. Smooth smoke, burns well and a sweet and fruity taste. I would give this 2 cushions on the couch locking scale" just because  the sativa in it makes you wanna move.”"
“Pretty decent high, would try again, a little too relaxing for me.”
“Good high with great taste. But it heavily sedates me and makes it hard to wake up at night.”

“Probably one of my favorite sativa strains the smell is awesome everytime I crack open a jar I get an intense grapefruit smell, that is so much like real grapefruits it still jumps out the flavor is just like the smell only maybe not quite as intense. “Gorgeous taste smell and flavour totally unique”
“Very energetic and euphoric beginning..mellows out after about 45 minutes leading to super stress free moods. Great for a concert or for doing things without losing your mind lol”

The smoke is really smooth and let's you take huge hits without much coughing and tastes slightly fru...”
“Sativa sativa sativa! Fruity and sweet, lots of energy, very uplifting. The nug I had was gorgeous and a gram by itself. An energetic, productive high, but a bit jittery.”
“I'm a big fan of Sativas and this really hit the spot, great tasting bud with strong euphoric and energising effects. Left me feeling happy and care free with a clear head. Great smoke!”
“The smell and taste is quite good. Very good 'sleep' strain, and a nice way to relax without over doing it.”

“This strain will definitely keep you up and the taste is great. Although, Grapefruit gives me severe anxiety attacks. So, if you're one who is easily triggered for anxiety attacks, I'd pass on this one”
“Awesome strain with a lovely citric flavor, strong mind effect and body relaxing...a very good one”
“This is a nice strain good taste”

“It was pretty harsh on the throat, but man did it hit hard. My tolerance or what I thought it was, was shattered. Did a small bowl to take a taste test. Surprisingly the grapefruit element came through. All in all, this strain will get you ripped at the cost of being harsh.”
“Definitely not the best, but a nice bud to relax too! Perfect if you're about to take a nap or just lay down for a quick rest.”
“Taste just like grapefruit great sativa shawty”
“The flavor is amazing, and the buds quality is just great. Really smells unique and like Grapefruit which is awesome.”
“Fantastic”

“Amazing taste ❤️ fruity/citrusy 🍋

“Smells refreshing and tastes delicious vaped, very even high. Often very hairy, covered in long pistols. Easy to grow and does well outdoors. One of my very favourites!”

“This strain is the first one I’ve tried that tastes like.... well the name. I can actually taste grapefruit, so much so it makes me happy ❤️❤️”

“Picked up a gram of this for research at a local lab and not to shabby.  Nice  mellowing, heady high great for early morning coffee wake and bake.”

“Amazing. One of my favorites for sure. I can do anything while high on this strain, including go to work. I get high off of one good hit. The only down side is it burns your throat easily. But other than 
that I love it 🍊”
“I think this strain is spectacular, love the smell and taste. is also very sticky.”
“This is by far my favorite strain of all time! The taste is great. The high is wicked strong and uplifting.”

“Great strain. Has a sour smell and citrus taste. Very smooth hitting when smoked relative to its potency. Definitely a good daytime strain as it wont make you feel tired, however I have found if you haven't eaten recently or are dehydrated it can leave a dull headache.”
“THIS SHIT CLAPS”
“Not the strongest in the world, but it's a perfect daytime strain for when you want to get shit done. Very clean high with no lingering effects once it's worn off. My new daytime go-to!”
“This may be my new favorite daytime strain. Crisp, clear high. Amazing scent! Very manageable and pleasant.”
“Great day time, head high. Energizing but relaxing at the same time”

“Nice uplifting daytime strain. I find it not to be potent enough unless in concentrate form. I'm not a big sativa fan so it losses points for me. The nice thing about this one is I don't get any anxiety, also the flavour is great.”

“Kinda fun, heady strain. But that's not what this review is about.

I suffer from Sciatica. It's been attacking me for for about 36 hours. THC oil relieves the pain but last night I smoked some grapefruit and 12 hours later, No Sciatica! I am SHOCKED!!! If this stuff will cure my sciatica, it's worth its weight in gold!”
“This one is giggly for me! Very uplifting :)”
“By far my favourite strain. Strong, energetic high. Not sleepy, more like excited and focused. Big laughs, very strong.”

“Grapefruit has strong grapefruit and citrus smell and has an outstanding taste I consumed it by smoke everytime I used it and it is by far one of my favorite sativas, shows sativa effects but you dont get too aroused by it and it can be said that it has a good focusing side effect  too.”
“the taste is a little rough and I got insane dry eyes from it but according to my husband, I wouldn't stop talking 😂”
“One of the best-tasting strains I've had.”
“very nice fruity strain nice relaxing effect just love it”
“Clean, energetic, uplifting.  Great for wake and bake to gat the day started and ease any tension/pain”

“I fully recommend it for day or time use when you have things to do and you don't want to feel tired and sluggish”

“Grape fruity smell and flavor.

 Great sativa”
“grapefruit and citrus smell. slightly acidic with smoking, exhale can taste harsh to fruity. definitely uplifting and happy.  going well with watching Broad city”
“Tried in concentrate,  focused and happy!!! Quality strain, I will remember this taste and high.”

“A great uplifting citrus strain that was very functional for daytime use. The buds have great presentation, with large thick buds and an amazing smell that supports its name. I would highly recommend this strain for the daytime sativa hybrid smokers”
“Banging strain. this I've delivers full flavor, stonie high, & it carries throughout your ride. Pair with fresh mango.”

“I am not a big fan of sativa. I suffer from anxiety and smoking sativas e.g. haze makes me a little anxious. “Phenotype and grow of the cut I got was perrrrrfect! To be under the impression of holding fresh grapefruit in your hands and tasting candied peels with hints of honey when burned is what Grapefruit feels like. Gentle and energetic high. For the fruity sativa gourmet.”
“I'm a sucker for fruity tasting strains so this one is definitely one of my favorites to smoke.”
“Bought an eighth of this stinky citrusy strain . Great day time euphoric high 🤘🏼”
“Lovely! Brought me out of an Indica high so nicely, not a heavy head high and I totally feel the Sativa effects, so nice this flower. Now one of my favs!”
“I got this as a free gram when I ordered a while ago. Amazing smell and taste. The smell is absolutely amazing and overpowering. One of my favourite strains.”
“Another wonderful uplifting strain. This one smells amazing and the high is energetic. Great for anxiety as it calms and relaxes the worries away. I can use this day or evening...”
“WasThis strain has a awesome flavor if you're looking for something sweet and fruity and total mind high but feeling awake! love it!”
“Such a fantastic high!  Made me feel happy but not too giggly. Also seemed to really alleviate muscle pain.”

“Picked up a Q of this last week and it's now a fast favourite with me and every guy I smoked it with!”
“This strain had me cleaning the house before bed. Great uplifting and motivating high”

“Good taste and hit for this strain.”
“Most dense bud I've ever purchased. Absolutely incredible high and beautiful weed to look at. Can't recommend enough.”
“Is a very interesting string. It has a citric smell which is like fruit, fruity like grapes.”
“Very euphoric, head high, felt extremly uplifted and happy. has a very pungent fruity citrusy taste and smell”
“Yabadabadoo.”
“LOVE IT! Great taste, smell, and great high.”

“This combines all the nice effects of a good Sativa with a really enjoyable sense of physical relaxation. I think it's due to the lineage connection to Jack Herer, in my non-expert opinion.

Medicinally, the relaxation part helped me a great deal with some shoulder osteo-arthritis. I would imagine this strain would be good for stress relief, as well.

Recreationally, I'd say it's perfect for any social scenario with ...”
“Strong high, won't make you sleepy it will make you fairly energetic, lots of orange hairs on this strain. Gives an all over high. 8/10.”

“This strain tends to make me paranoid depending on the dose. I use cannabis to treat anxiety and insomnia so I don't often use strains that give me paranoia, but Grapefruit is an exception. I mix a little bit of it with an indica like OGK (75/25) and it's great.”

“Nice mid.. if you are new and need something energetic this is great..good for depression and anxiety...as you toke more you need more..it's really for beginners but big tokers may need some thing a bit stronger..good citrus smell and flavour. .very nice..could be the dispensary that made it more mid but i liked it either way.”

“Amazing smell and taste like grapefruit! One of more potent strains I've consumed. Uplifting sativa high that just mellows out and keeps you going. The only thing bad about the strain is that massive bong rips taste like shit, just too much grapefruit.”
“Eine der geschmacklich besten Sorten die es meiner Meinung nach gibt! Auf jedenfall probieren!”

“For a heavy sativa I was pleasantly surprised by Grapefruits effects. No to head heavy but very noticeable, the bud itself is very beautiful. Had to try it out never seen or heard about the strain before. Four thumbs up for sure.”

“I give this bad boy a like 3.3 out of 5 for me. I like the grapefruit taste on exhale but this stuff makes me cough- sets the asthma off right away. “weed in a Vape 
good high smelt a bit odd. reminded me of pineapple chunk the smell and look. relax and calm high and was very hungry afterwards.”
“A nice strain! A very uplifting strain that puts a silly smile on my face. The smell is very attractive and the test is decent as well. Not a knockout by any means but definitely potent.”
“Absolutely love it. Mood is up and energy is up while still being relaxed. Top favorite.”
“Sweet tropical taste. Has my mind faded”
“if you have not tried this sativa, please do. wonderful inspiring energetic strain. mari j's in everett has the best quality I have found.”
“Citrus flavors.  I did get a bit of a headache.  Made me feel happy and I was laughing while cleaning the bathroom.”
“It's a smooth taste of Grapefruit, a good happy relax high with a THC of 23% at 12 $ a gram . You can beat it”

“Shatter, clarity counts, one or two hits on a wax attachment I have for my vape setup will leave you with a burning throat/chest that slowly leaves the game abandoning you in that concentrate specific FULLY MEDICATED head space. Solid Dabs”
“So delicious!  My 2nd favourite after Green Crack.  Sativa”
“favorite strain of all time”
“Great citrus smell, gets you geeked up”

“I traded my bike for 4 ounces of this back when i was 16, do i regret? Hell No!! ever since then Ive been looking for a good batch of grapefruit, thankfully  my freinds  at medicalclub.ca have been able their hands on some.

Thanks guys!!!!!”

“Nice tangy flavour true to its name, this is a good strain to wake up too! A nice pick up and go without leaving you hazy and cloudy on the down side. Grandma always told me to get my grapefruit in early ;-)”
“Great day time buds, stinky citrusy compact buds.”

“I like this Sativa! Brings the classic Sativa headiness, but it is also on the mellow side with good pain relief! Great daytime option. Aroma and flavor are pretty grapefruity!  Citrus notes with a little bit of spice! Good Sativa!”
“great strain”

“Recently had some extremely good Sativa and Grapefruit is certainly one of them. Great tropical acidic fruitiness in this strain. Awesome mental uplifting effect. Great for writing or nice conversations in a party. Good for an afternoon at the beach!”

“Where to begin, oh let's get high.  Ok now I'm ready, taste is citrus with a underbite of fresh earth and a exhale of dry tongue (dry tongue; strain that causes throat to dry up) but the euphoria is on point with a clear delivery of a high. On point strain.”

“Got a bag of this, and first off before even opening the bag I could tell that this was going to be a good smoke Just by the nice dense, dry, forest green Trichome covered nugs that I could see through the bag. After opening it, I fully knew I made a good decision, the smell was delicious, pungy with a bit of earth and a nice citrus kind of finish. The taste was good, not too bland or harsh, didn't make me feel like ...”

“Such a good productivity" strain. And the best part... no anxiety (at least for me)! Can smoke this all day and be content with my high. Great for those with a bit of social anxiety too. Love this strain.”"
“Although I had a very bad panic attack, this is probably the most potent and also my all time favorite strain that I have knowingly smoked. 9.99999 out of 10”
“incredible smell and flavor. beautiful buds with very relaxing qualities. excellent for pain and stress relief.”
“Amazing. One of the best strains. 'Had an amazing time with my friends. This thing makes me happy, talkative, anxiety free, etc. Perfect for a night with your friends.”
“Very delicious with a fruity, citrusy taste with a very good high”
“bought a q of this today and stunk up the bus home even though it was in several bags inside my makeup bag :') beautiful flavours and great with coffee!”
“Great strain. Nice, relaxed feeling, but not terribly potent. Doesn't impair motor skills as much as most other strains.”
“one of my top 10”
“This strain is spectacular, smells and taste great also very sticky.”
“IDK about potent" but it's a mellow strain if it's grown correctly.”"

“Incredible head high - no cloudiness or confusion. Was able to go about my daily activities with ease! Fantastic Sativa, and smokes so smooth - whether in a bong or joint. Will certainly be getting more.”
“Nice citrus flavors”
“Tastes alot like it's name.  Sweet taste and long lasting head buzz.”
“Lovely day time high. Clear headed calm. Stress and anxiety relief. Nice citrusy scent.”
“One of my favorites. Very subtle high, a good 'everyday' strain. Perfect to help brighten your mood and relax.”

“This could be grower-specific, but I found that this strain gave me a general feeling of malaise every time I smoked it. I was high, but neither relaxed not focused, just sort of foggy and sick feeling.”

“This strain is the best smelling and tasting weed I have ever had. That is one star the second goes to the fact that it is a nice and energetic high.

Now the problems with this strain is even though it gives a pleasant mind high it also gives me headaches along with it. The headache disperses by the time I have had way too much and it becomes noticeable that I am high.”

“My brain doesn’t typically dig sativa’s,I’m naturally “Far-out” so I tend to smoke indica dominant strains.  BUT along came, Grapefruit... This s*** is amazing & doesn’t over stimulate, my naturally stimulated mind!!! It was only available one time at my local dispensary, a.k.a Second Home, and I haven’t been able to re-up on it. Anyways, I recommend this to your friends, your siblings, shoot, in my case, your grandp...”

“I don't think the description is correct on this strain. Grapefruit is a clone only strain that was very popular in BC that doesn't appeared in the 80's Many believe it is believed to be a northern lights phenotype”
“Great strain for creativity, uplifting my spirit, and inspiring romance. One of my favorite strains”
“Smells great! It has so many trichomes that it stays lit”
“very chilled and giggly”
“Picked up some live resin recently with terpenes testing at 21.40%. Absolutely tastes like a grapefruit, I promise. Nice invigorating racy high.”
“My favorite wake and bake weed.  I love that I can smoke it all day and still be focused.  Great for painting and yard work!”
“Amazing strain.”
“Dankity Dank! Super tasty! Clean! Like candy and had be dabed out for hours.”
“One of my favourite strains.”
“It's a great, mellow head high”
“good strain. got to accomplish things while feeling a nice high...coming down tho I kinda got a little headache, mainly hungry and dry mouth.”
“Burned though this cartridge fast and would defiantly buy some more.  Strong strain with good vibes.”
“Renton W.A”

“This is a pretty potent strain with typical sativa effects. Two rips and I was good for a couple hours. This is a great day strain. It keeps your head clear and brings tons of energy. I smoked in the evening and had difficulty getting to sleep that night.”
“tastes like grape tootsie pop.”
“Bought this one made me felt uplifted and the smell was fruty but strong so goood loved it!”

“A very strong, fast acting, stress reducing, fruity strain thats perfect for wake and bake.  This is a great strain for studying, art projects, social settings or for post-stressful situations.  Delicious and dependable for a busy day at school or work.”

“This is the first strain I ever purchased myself, and it was worth every penny. Aromatic citrus fills your nose instantly. The taste is just as good as the aroma. A euphoric head high; perfect for daytime. Grapefruit gives a phenomenal creative buzz for hours. My first love will always be my favorite strain.”

“I've tried this in a kurvana cartridge and it's pretty much the perfect hybrid. Not speedy but not too spacey or sleep inducing either. Clear headed and happy high. My go-to day time cartridge & favorite overall (along with True OG) of the kurvana flavors.”
“This is my go to strain.  Not the easiest to find.  Smells amazing, always satisfies.  And if you have a Volcano, not many better strains for it”
“The tastiest strain I've found. Really smells and tastes like grapefruit. Got this from brightside.”
“Made me tired.  I was looking fir upper.”
“THEY SHOULD CALL THIS SHIT UCHICAGO HAZE BC ITS SOOOOOOOO GOOD FOR STRESS AND JUST BEING HAPPY WE NEED MORE OF THAT HERE”

“A score of 4.3 is considered low on this site. But i would give it 4.5  Copped it on sale and was looking for a sativa. Like my review, It kinda lacks creativity and the smell/flavor is very boring. Ive had dirt that tastes and smells better. Kinda dissappointing with Durban Poision being so good. Decent euphoria. Pretty clear head high. If you are lucky like some of us that can go to a dispensary legally, then you a...”
“Dabbing now.  This taste like citrus.   Nice high with little bho”
“This is the worst medical cannabis strain i have ever picked up. Had the worst smell taste & look. It was awful!! I didnt even smoke the rest of the eighth. Wouldnt recommend this strain to anyone.”
“aswe”
“tried this yesterday and it didn't get me stoned whatsoever. smoked the whole eighth even.”
“It’s nice, makes me feel sleepy though”
“Smell and taste like grapefruit. That's pretty much all about it :(”

“We'll the name makes sense. I personally hate grapefruit, but thankfully the sourness doesn't come through in the strain. It will leave your pallet with a sort of sweet hazy fruit aftertaste toward the back of your dab/hit. Overall a great uplifting high”
“maybe I've been smoking to much but.....”
“Nice taste. The buzz falls flat.”
“Had this strain and something called a stealth stick. If I could've given it zero stars I would have. Yuck”
“Okay. Had a bunch of this and got a little bit sick of it after a while. Decent but not the best.”
“100% Oklahoma grapefruit”
“I wanted to like this bud, but I can't say I do. It is not the easiest strain to figure out dosing". I was either in a full blown panic attack for an hour after smoking it
column4: or I had little to no effect. I tried long tokes
column6: and limiting myself to one or two hits at a time; never got the hang of this particular breed. I am going to continue testing this out and will write another review in a month. Lets h...”"

column3: “this must've been the pre-roll i got from the dispensary 2 days ago. it really did nothing for me. when i go back for my next free one [today], i'm going to ask me to let them smell them so my nose can do the choosing! i want the NYC Sour D pre-roll, so we can quit playin around with all the other mess!”
“I like! Great taste,  good med. Will definitely get more. :) Peace!”
“This strain is not very good.  From all the medical strains I have tried, it ranks in the lowest.”
“Feeling was disgusting. Throat felt horrible the whole time. High was definitely not worth the pain that also lasted the whole time.”
